review: It has been great!  My kids love the programming available on the Prime movies and shows.  I have not fully explored the options available but hope to be able to explore more from the internet than I have so far.
author: Chef Frank

review: The Fire Stick is great!  I also have Chromecast, but I like that I don't need to use any device to use the fire stick.  Once it's on you just use the remote to navigate and that's all there is to it!
author: Julie

review: It's ok right now, I just have to get use to it.
author: Dalovely1755

review: User friendly. I love mine. Shipped in a timely manner.
author: Monica M. Ramirez

review: absolutely love our FireStick... now, if CBS would jump on board & let their episodes be viewed for free for Prime members, life would be grand!
author: Kathey Childress "taynjoey"

review: I tried my parents Roku and it was garbage, I was afraid about the fire stick being the same but it's amazing quality! It's faster, the picture is better more setting to adjust your quality. Parental control is a plus so he can't buy stuff on accident!!!
author: lushycupcake

review: I looovvve this product.  So ezy to work with and the picture quality perfect. Love it.
author: Ray
